attributes.action: To keep Piers Morgan out of the UK
attributes.additional_details:
In light of our Yankee friends attempts to extradite Piers back to the UK, this petition is to make sure we do all we can to stop the insufferable oaf getting back in.
We, unlike our neighbours, have had to suffer this egotistical know nothings drivvel for many years both in our newspapers and on our tellyboxes.
With countless lefty moronic bleatings along with his own shameless self publicity it is in the publics interest to not allow his incoherant warblings loose on the public ever again.
We've managed to dump him on one unsuspecting country before, we won't be so lucky again!!
